title: Link survey data to participant data — link_surveys
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante_data_example:d0rt", version = "current")) surveys <- process_surveys(dataset_spec) participants <- process_participants(dataset_spec) survey_data <- surveys |> link_surveys(participants) } # }

text: dataset_spec List dataset names versions retrieve. max_results Max number records load table (defaults entire table).

title: Process participants — process_participants

title: Process run data — process_runs
code: process_runs(   dataset_spec,   remove_incomplete_runs = TRUE,   remove_invalid_runs = TRUE,   max_results = NULL )

title: Process run data — process_runs
text: dataset_spec List dataset names versions retrieve. remove_incomplete_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked incomplete (defaults TRUE). remove_invalid_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked invalid (defaults TRUE). max_results Max number records load table (defaults entire table).

title: Process run data — process_runs
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante_data_example:d0rt", version = "current")) runs <- process_runs(dataset_spec) } # }

title: Process survey data — process_surveys
code: process_surveys(   dataset_spec,   survey_types = c("caregiver", "student", "teacher"),   remove_incomplete_surveys = FALSE,   max_results = NULL )

title: Process survey data — process_surveys
text: dataset_spec List dataset names versions retrieve. survey_types Character vector survey types include (caregiver, student, teacher). remove_incomplete_surveys Boolean indicating whether drop surveys marked incomplete (defaults FALSE). max_results Max number records load table (defaults entire table).

title: Process survey data — process_surveys
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante_data_example:d0rt", version = "current")) surveys <- process_surveys(dataset_spec) } # }

title: Process trial data — process_trials
code: process_trials(   dataset_spec,   remove_incomplete_runs = TRUE,   remove_invalid_runs = TRUE,   remove_invalid_trials = FALSE,   tasks = NULL,   participants = NULL,   max_results = NULL )

title: Process trial data — process_trials
text: dataset_spec List dataset names versions retrieve. remove_incomplete_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked incomplete (defaults TRUE). remove_invalid_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked invalid (defaults TRUE). remove_invalid_trials Boolean indicating whether drop trials marked invalid (defaults FALSE). tasks Character vector tasks include. participants (Optional) Data frame includes columns "dataset" "user_id", supplied trial data filtered user IDs. max_results Max number records load table (defaults entire table).

title: Process trial data — process_trials
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante_data_example:d0rt", version = "current")) trials <- process_trials(dataset_spec) } # }

title: Process trial data — process_trials_prelim
code: process_trials_prelim(   dataset_spec,   remove_incomplete_runs = TRUE,   remove_invalid_runs = TRUE,   remove_invalid_trials = FALSE,   tasks = NULL,   participants = NULL,   max_results = NULL )

title: Process trial data — process_trials_prelim
text: dataset_spec List dataset names versions retrieve. remove_incomplete_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked incomplete (defaults TRUE). remove_invalid_runs Boolean indicating whether drop runs marked invalid (defaults TRUE). remove_invalid_trials Boolean indicating whether drop trials marked invalid (defaults FALSE). tasks Character vector tasks include. participants (Optional) Data frame includes columns "dataset" "user_id", supplied trial data filtered user IDs. max_results Max number records load table (defaults entire table).

title: Process trial data — process_trials_prelim
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante_data_example:d0rt", version = "current")) trials_prelim <- process_trials_prelim(dataset_spec) } # }
